argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_cvp | |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. HAtoms ) -> ( ( A i^i B ) = 0H <-> A <oH ( A vH B ) ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_atelch | |- ( B e. HAtoms -> B e. CH ) |
| 3 |  | #P_cvexch | |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. CH ) -> ( ( A i^i B ) <oH B <-> A <oH ( A vH B ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_cvmd | |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. CH /\ ( A i^i B ) <oH B ) -> A MH B ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_3expia | |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. CH ) -> ( ( A i^i B ) <oH B -> A MH B ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_sylbird | |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. CH ) -> ( A <oH ( A vH B ) -> A MH B ) ) |
| 7 | 2, 6 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. HAtoms ) -> ( A <oH ( A vH B ) -> A MH B ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 7 | #P_sylbid | |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. HAtoms ) -> ( ( A i^i B ) = 0H -> A MH B ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_atnssm0 | |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. HAtoms ) -> ( -. B C_ A <-> ( A i^i B ) = 0H ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_con1bid | |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. HAtoms ) -> ( -. ( A i^i B ) = 0H <-> B C_ A ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_ssmd2 | |- ( ( B e. CH /\ A e. CH /\ B C_ A ) -> A MH B ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_3com12 | |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. CH /\ B C_ A ) -> A MH B ) |
| 13 | 2, 12 | #P_syl3an2 | |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. HAtoms /\ B C_ A ) -> A MH B ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_3expia | |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. HAtoms ) -> ( B C_ A -> A MH B ) ) |
| 15 | 10, 14 | #P_sylbid | |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. HAtoms ) -> ( -. ( A i^i B ) = 0H -> A MH B ) ) |
| 16 | 8, 15 | #P_pm2.61d | |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. HAtoms ) -> A MH B ) |
